prompt.toTooltip: Replace current prompt with this one
prompt.fromTooltip: Save current prompt to this slot
prompt.makeTooltip: Fill prompt and click Make button

settings.purgeClickHint: Click 5 times to activate purge sequence

ops.noPostId: No post ID found in URL

features.savePrompts: Save and organize prompts in packs
features.themes: Multiple color themes and UI sizes

help.aboutText: ImagineGodMode helps you manage video generation prompts with features like saving prompt packs, rating, importing/exporting, upscaling videos to HD, and auto-downloading media.

tooltips.crossBrowser: Works seamlessly on both Firefox and Chrome browsers
tooltips.saveOrganize: Create multiple packs to organize your prompts by theme or project
tooltips.packManagement: Add new packs, delete existing ones, and easily switch between them
tooltips.ratePrompts: Click stars to rate your prompts from 1-5 stars for easy quality tracking
tooltips.arrowKeys: Use left/right arrow keys to quickly browse through videos
tooltips.importExport: Share packs with others or backup your prompts as JSON files
tooltips.aiGenerate: Use Grok AI to generate entire prompt packs from templates
tooltips.downloadMedia: Automatically download all images and HD videos from a post
tooltips.parallelUpscale: Upscale multiple videos to HD quality simultaneously for faster processing
tooltips.bulkOperations: Perform delete, upscale, relike, or unlike actions on multiple posts at once
tooltips.purgeData: Completely wipe all extension data with a secure confirmation sequence
tooltips.batchSelection: Hold Shift and click to select multiple items in bulk operations
tooltips.makeNext: Automatically apply prompt and navigate to next post in sequence
tooltips.realtimeProgress: See live progress bar while videos are generating
tooltips.playPause: Control video playback with play/pause button or spacebar
tooltips.fullscreen: Watch videos in fullscreen mode by pressing F or clicking the button
tooltips.hideUnsave: Remove the unsave button from the UI for cleaner interface
tooltips.themeCustomization: Choose from 7 different themes to match your style
tooltips.uiScaling: Scale the entire UI from 70% (Tiny) to 115% (Large)
tooltips.autoDownloadMedia: Enable automatic downloads when video generation completes
tooltips.multiLanguage: Switch between English, Spanish, and Russian languages

confirmDelete.title: Delete Pack
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{packName}}"?

purge.title: ⚠️ PURGE ALL DATA
purge.allLikedPostsDesc: Will attempt to unlike all posts
purge.allPromptPacksDesc: Every pack and prompt will be deleted
